text:
Shopkeeper told me off for "wasting his time" when I hesitated due to the fit/comfort of the shoes I was trying.

I was there for around 5 minutes, during which time I tried 2 pairs of shoes - one of which was because he retrieved the wrong model.

Do not recommend entering this shop unless you are sure you will buy. Queensway service standards have really dropped. No wonder people buy online nowadays.
